snippet.title: TWISTEX - Steam Non VR Trailer
snippet.description:
TWISTEX is Coming to Steam January 11th!
On Screen or in VR

TWISTEX is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. Made especially for VR, it combines classic gameplay with original, new mechanics.

CLEAR RINGS, COLORS AND LEVELS
TWISTEX has 2 game types, Ring Drop and Color Drop. Each has an endless mode with 3 difficulties, and 24 levels to complete.

UNLOCK AND CUSTOMIZE
Clearing levels will unlock new towers, blocks, music and environments, for you to customize your experience.

LEADERBOARDS
Compete for the top spot, or beat your friends, on the online leaderboards.

FEEL THE PRESSURE
As the blocks get higher, so does the pressure. Try to keep your cool as the music and environment react to how you're doing.

Wishlist now!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2518940/TWISTEX?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=ytnvr

Available NOW on Meta Quest 2 and higher, with 'Mixed Reality Filters'

SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/20677/twistex?utm_source=ytnvr

Oculus/Meta Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5761208457328437?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=ytnvr

Join the discord server to get involved, or follow the socials for the latest updates.

Discord: https://discord.gg/UucU2CtKba
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MiddleManGames1
Threads: https://threads.net/@middlemangames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/middlemangames/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@middlemangames
